reload.name: [%key:common::action::reload%]
reload.description: Reloads trend sensors from the YAML-configuration.

user.title: Trend helper
user.description: The trend helper allows you to create a sensor which show the trend of a numeric state or a state attribute from another entity.

data.attribute: Attribute of entity that this sensor tracks

data.min_gradient: Minimum rate at which the value must be changing
data.sample_duration: Duration in seconds to store samples for

data_description.max_samples: The maximum number of samples to store. If the number of samples exceeds this value, the oldest samples will be discarded.
data_description.min_samples: The minimum number of samples that must be collected before the gradient can be calculated.
data_description.min_gradient: The minimum rate at which the observed value must be changing for this sensor to switch on. The gradient is measured in sensor units per second.
data_description.sample_duration: The duration in seconds to store samples for. Samples older than this value will be discarded.
